name: Grilled
description: Add some flair to your moderation with a dramatic 10-second countdown before banning users. Simple and effective with safety checks.
author: UltPanda, Grill
install_msg: Thanks for installing Grilled! Use `[p]grill @user [reason]` to ban with a dramatic 10-second countdown. Use `[p]help grill` for more info.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data permanently. It only tracks active grill sessions temporarily during command execution.
